text: Can't believe they're actually claiming to have invented fire! Do they think we're all cavemen who just discovered the internet?
Well, maybe they meant they've "reinvented" fire somehow. You know, like "Fire 2.0" 😂
I'd be down for a Fire 2.0, as long as it's open source and can be forked.
Introducing FireJS, the lightweight, blazing-fast alternative to traditional fire! 🔥
It's just a publicity stunt. They're trying to create a firestorm, no pun intended.
I can't wait for the Tech Giant vs. Prometheus legal battle. Talk about intellectual property rights!
Who would represent Prometheus, though? Maybe the eagle that ate his liver? 😆
I'd pay to see that! Someone should livestream the trial on Twitch.
I heard they're actually trying to patent the chemical reaction that causes fire. Is that even possible?
Next thing you know, they'll be trying to patent oxygen.
I wonder if they'll try to copyright the term "fire" next. Better not use it in my next project name!
Just add "blockchain" or "AI" to your project name, and they'll never notice. "FireAI" or "FireChain" it is!
Don't give them ideas! Next week, we'll have a new startup called FireChainAI, revolutionizing the fire industry.
Fire as a Service (FaaS) - pay per flame hour. The future is now! 🔥
Let's not forget that they claimed to have invented the wheel last year. At least they're consistent.
